details.issue_identified: Import path mismatch in hal_routes_loader.py causing application crash
details.root_cause: hal_routes_loader.py was using relative import 'routes.hal_routes' but system expected absolute import 'app.routes.hal_routes'

solution_implemented.hal_routes_loader_fix: Enhanced with flexible import paths and multiple fallback mechanisms
solution_implemented.minimal_hal_routes: Created minimal implementation as ultimate fallback

details.expected_outcome: Application will successfully load HAL routes using one of the multiple import paths or fallback mechanisms
